metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4338 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An integer underflow in Organization Specific TLV was found in various versions of OpenvSwitch.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> same commit as CVE-2022-4337 This issue is fixed in (3.0.3-0ubuntu0.22.10.1) in kinetic but is not in the -security pocket.

criterions.comment: openvswitch: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
